1. Download JDK from http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html Dont if you have (it can take a while
2. Install JDK
3. Download lastest ecplise IDE from http://www.eclipse.org/ (if you already have an eclipse, dont'
4. Extract eclipse
5. install starcraft broodwar (for example, to c:\StarCraft
	- also apply patch BW 1161
6. copy from dependencies/copy_content_to_windows to C:\Windows
7. copy from dependencies/copy_contenct_to_starcraft to your starcraft installation
8. copy dependencies/Chaoslauncher somewhere
9. Run ChaosLauncher, configure starcraft installation path
10. Open eclipse
11. Configure include properties for BWU
12. Run SampleBot in eclipse
13. Run ChaosLauncher
14. Configure match
